Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
This is a good idea. I'm sure I'll find some use for it in the Mpris plugin for j4status.

Just a few notes.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
These numbers are off and I think it has something to do with the mysterious constants.

There is about a 10px blind spot on the right side of my status line. The problem becomes much worse for smaller/larger fonts. If we are going to enhance this, then more people will use it, so it should be a bit more accurate I think.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: Please add a DLOG here with the block name and instance.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
This `return` could present a slight usability problem in the case the user has a long status line and a lot of workspaces.

If the status line overlaps the workspace buttons, the click should ideally go to the workspace button.

Maybe it would suffice to only return in the case of a mouse wheel event?

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: The formatting is messed up here. I think it would improve readability a lot if you added some white space here as well.
